title: Share of children of lower secondary school age achieving minimum proficiency in reading, by population type
subtitle: The share of children who achieve minimum [reading](#dod:reading-proficiency) proficiency by the end of [lower secondary](#dod:lower-secondary-education) education, where children can connect main ideas across different text types, understand the author's intentions, and draw conclusions from the text. Compares all children in the age group versus only those enrolled in school.
